forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle between 10pm and 4am, then a slight chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. Southwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
The morning in Downtown San Francisco unfolds with a gentle clarity, bathed in the soft glow of early daylight. The modest warmth of a high reaching near 64 degrees brings a pleasant invitation to step outside, though the temperature will subtly retreat to around 59 in the afternoon, hinting at a slight chill as the day progresses. A whisper of a south-southwest wind, barely stirring at 2 to 8 mph, adds a refreshing touch to the air, lending itself well to a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or through the historic streets.

As night draws near, the sky is poised to embrace a hint of complexity, with a modest chance of drizzle after 10 PM, transforming the mostly sunny disposition into a more introspective ambiance—perhaps perfect for a cozy evening indoors with a good book or a film. The forecast calls for mostly cloudy skies, and a low of 52 will encourage layers; light jackets or cardigans will prevent an evening chill from dampening the spirit. The sight of fog may linger in some pockets, particularly around the bay and coastal areas, adding to the atmospheric charm of the city. Taking a moment to relish this transient beauty might inspire a visit to a local café, sipping a warm drink while watching the contours of the city soften into soft silhouettes as the sun bids farewell.
